title: GOLD 1 - LFT - TOP/SUP/JG
body:
Hey guys, I'm 21 years old. I don't have many friends on LoL so I haven't really ever been asked to join a team so that's why I am posting a topic here.

I main sup/top/jg. I can play anywhere, those are probably my best three.

replies.body: Hey dude I swung you an add, might have a spot for you
No worries, what position do you have free?
